holidays.title: National Lottery Day
holidays.description: There’s something about free money that seems rather appealing.

holidays.title: World Emoji Day
holidays.description: Light up your friends' phones with all the emojis you want today — it's a healthy obsession.

holidays.title: Global Hug Your Kids Day
holidays.description: Wrap your kid in a bear hug on Global Hug Your Kids Day.

holidays.title: King's Birthday in Lesotho
holidays.description: Let's dive into the history of this event and check out fun ways to celebrate.

holidays.title: Korean Constitution Day
holidays.description: Hang the national flag in honor of the proclamation of the South Korean constitution.

holidays.title: Marine Day in Japan
holidays.description: Celebrate Marine Day by going to the beach and appreciating what we’ve been given.

holidays.title: National Cory Day
holidays.description: Celebrate and appreciate all Corys around the world on this National Cory Day.

holidays.title: National Get Out of the Dog House Day
holidays.description: No one wants to be ‘in the doghouse’ — this day encourages us to get out.

holidays.title: National Peach Ice Cream Day
holidays.description: It's sweet, it's tangy, it's cold — it is everything you need in this hot weather!

holidays.title: National Tattoo Day
holidays.description: It illuminates something you didn’t see before.

holidays.title: President's Day in Botswana
holidays.description: Get ready to commemorate the leader of a nation on Botswana’s most important holiday.

holidays.title: U Tirot Sing Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the power of determination and bravery as we mark U Tirot Sing Day.

holidays.title: World Day for International Justice
holidays.description: Justice is served, internationally! Read on for how we plan to honor this day.

holidays.title: Wrong Way Corrigan Day
holidays.description: We celebrate the man famous for flying the 'wrong way' — Douglas Corrigan.

holidays.title: Yellow Pig Day
holidays.description: Whether you’re a math rookie or a world-leading professor, let's celebrate!

holidays.title: Angela Merkel’s Birthday
holidays.description: Merkel started her political journey in 1989 when she joined the Democratic Awakening.

holidays.title: David Hasselhoff’s Birthday
holidays.description: David Hasselhoff has inspired the globe with his roles for more than 40 years.

holidays.title: Jeremih Felton’s Birthday
holidays.description: This singer, songwriter, and producer’s debut single catapulted him into the limelight.

holidays.title: Kade Skye’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kade Skye is a YouTube star and is recognized as a part of the “Kids Fun T.V.”

holidays.title: Kali Uchis’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s a Grammy-award-winning singer with a long list of achievements to be proud of.

holidays.title: Luke Bryan’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented American country singer will remain authentic, that is for sure.
